entities.name: platform nine
entities.description: Platform where Harry is supposed to board his train to Hogwarts. It is described as a platform that doesn't exist yet, with only numbers 9 and 10 visible.

entities.name: platform ten
entities.description: Platform next to platform nine, also mentioned by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: Hogwarts
entities.description: A school for magic, where Harry is supposed to attend. It is mentioned as a place that the guard has never heard of.

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is described as having an 'even nastier' smile when saying goodbye to Harry.

entities.name: Dursleys
entities.description: Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives. They are mentioned as laughing together while driving away from the scene.

entities.name: Hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, which is causing him to attract funny looks because of its presence.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon mentions platform 9 and three-quarters in his conversation with Harry.
The guard has never heard of Hogwarts, as mentioned by the text.
